hook:
40 PRs merged in 7 days. We just turned the volume up — literally. 

Pollinations is no longer just an image generation platform. This week, we became a full-stack multimedia engine.
body:
Speed is our strategy. When new SOTA models drop, we integrate them immediately so developers can build with the bleeding edge without managing the infra.

Here is the breakdown of this week's shipping sprint:

1. VIDEO & AUDIO ARE LIVE
We integrated LTX-2 for video generation and ElevenMusic for duration-based audio. We also added OVH Whisper for speech-to-text. Developers can now build apps that see, speak, and listen — all through one API.

2. AGENT INFRASTRUCTURE
We released the source code for our Polly Discord bot and shipped the OpenClaw integration. We are laying the tracks for autonomous agents that don't just chat, but actively create media in communities.

3. MODEL VELOCITY
We upgraded to Claude 3.5 Opus and added support for Imagen-4, Flux-2-dev, and Grok-video. If it's new and good, it's on Pollinations.

→ THE BIGGER PICTURE
The 500+ apps built on our platform are evolving. They are moving from static asset generation to dynamic, multi-modal storytelling. We are building the engine to power them.

We build in the open. The roadmap is public. The code is yours.

Check the comments for the full changelog.
cta: What happens when you give autonomous agents the ability to generate video? Let's find out.
